title: Upper Chesapeake Debuts Finished $61M Cancer Institute
author: Staff
description: Bel Air, Md.-based Upper Chesapeake Health and University of Maryland Medical System in Baltimore have announced the completion of the Patricia D. and M. Scott Kaufman Cancer Center at the Upper Chesapeake Hospital Bel Air campus, according to a report from The Baltimore Sun.
cleaned_text: Bel Air, [Baltimore Sun](http://www.baltimoresun.com/news/maryland/harford/belair/ph-ag-cancer-ceremony-0920-20130918,0,2767199.story). The $61 million, 75,000-square-foot facility features a 27-bay infusion center, three private rooms, a healing garden, a breast center, radiation oncology areas, complementary alternative medicine and Cancer LifeNet, a logistical and financial support system for those struggling with cancer care.
